description: IconButton is a button that uses an icon. It can be a normal button or a link. It comes in various sizes and colors.

props.name: color
props.description: The color of the component. Supports theme colors.

props.name: disabled
props.description: If true, the component is disabled. Not available if rendered as a link.

props.name: href
props.description: If provided, the button will be rendered as an anchor element.
